lemma WhileLowStepInduct: assumes while1: "\<langle>while (b) c',s1\<rangle> \<rightarrow>* \<langle>Skip,s1'\<rangle>" and while2: "\<langle>while (b) c',s2\<rangle>\<rightarrow>*\<langle>Skip,s2'\<rangle>" and "\<Gamma> \<turnstile> b : Low" and body:"\<And>s1 s1' s2 s2'. \<lbrakk>\<langle>c',s1\<rangle> \<rightarrow>* \<langle>Skip,s1'\<rangle>; \<langle>c',s2\<rangle> \<rightarrow>* \<langle>Skip,s2'\<rangle>; \<Gamma> \<turnstile> s1 \<approx>\<^sub>L s2\<rbrakk> \<Longrightarrow> \<Gamma> \<turnstile> s1' \<approx>\<^sub>L s2'" and le: "\<Gamma> \<turnstile> s1 \<approx>\<^sub>L s2" shows "\<Gamma> \<turnstile> s1' \<approx>\<^sub>L s2'"
